data.text: Peter le John in nisuokhat kholeitiang ninasik phadan inthum chulpha, Biak-inn khan inleisi.
Halli inneiya inphut akekakiak mi inkhat inhongruoiya Suongkot katha, inti munkhan Biak-inn hongkaluut mi rakip diangnga inphut nisuo ah sial kanisik ah inleida.
Ama'n Peter li John Biak-inn khan inhongluut amupha, angmekhat naperu tia akut adouwa aleini.
Peter li John in amadiang kathatak ah in-enli, Peter in aleiti, “Keinidiang na-enro!”
Khawa jarra angmekhat inmani diang ralaang jeikate tia, malungkaluut ah alei-en.
Halli Peter in amadiang aleiti, “Kei soonna li dangka iteii neimong, takkha kineihi nangdiang napekate, Nazareth Jisu Christa ramingnga inthei-inlang siro!”
Halli ama'n akut changtiang ma-ouwa akeitheijei, khawapha takkhan mipa akeii li akeii-artui kha ahongngarjei,
halli ama'n inchoomma akeiiya ngirjei, kasi-kahong aphut jei, halli inmanile inruoiya Biak-inn khan inluut ah Pathian inminpaak ah insi-inhongjei.
Halli ama'n asi-ahongnga Pathian inminpaak kha khanna kaom mipui ngai'n inleimu,
inmani'n amahi eii Suongkot Katha inti biak-inn khan in-ongnga bukanipa ti injetpha, ama diangnga kasuok kha angmejei tia inmani rakip inleingak jei.
Mipa khan Peter li John mahuumma omlaikhan, Solomon Tuolngur, inti munkhan mi rakip in inngak ah inmani diang inhongtaanjei.

Peter in mipui kha amupha, inmani diang ati, “E Israel mi ngai, angsikme nangni'n hiwahi ningngak,” halli katha ah ningna-en? keini'n hiwa mipahi keini ranak khat-um Pathian kacheet tak-ah kin-inngamna khan kinminsi eii tia ningngaidon be?

Abraham, Isaac, khat-um Jacob Pathian khan, tichu eini nipi-nipu ngai Pathian in alur-alianna kha Asuokpa Jisu diang apejei; takkha nangni'n amakha achongkasi ngai kutchungnga ningleipesuok, halli Pilate in masuosik atisuo katung nangni'n Pilate maikuungnga leizootmakchu. Suok 3:15
Takkha nangni inchu mi inthiang khat-um mi katuun ama kha zootmakchu, mi kathat ama kha nangnisik ah Pilate diang masuonasik ningnijei, Matt 27:15-23; Mk 15:6-14; Luk 23:13-23; Jn 19:12-15
halli nangni'n ringna kanapepa kha ningthatjei, takkha Pathian in thiya inphut aminringjei, hiwa jarra keini sakhi kin-eii.

Ama ramingnga ngamna ranak khan hiwa kekakiak mipa chungnga ranak ngarna kha apejei. Ama ramingnga ngamna jarra chuon intho kha ningmu ningjetjei; hiwahi Jisu diangnga ngamna khan ningraja maikuungnga amahi imindam ejei.
“Halli tuunchu, ule-nai ngai, nangni le ninglamkakei ngai innum ningleijetmak jarra, Jisu diang ningleitho eii ti kei'n kajet.
Pathian in matiang pha kasoot tak-ah inphut Pathian-chongkachoi rakip diangnga ileiminrilsa Christa kha lapoong-laraalsik eii; tikha hinthoa huui itung ejei.
Khawa jarra malung thuulru, Pathian diang heikirru, khawakha ningtho inchu ama'n ningmanu ngaikha narangaidam pisik eii.
Nangni sik-ah ikadang suojei Messiah kha tichu Pumi diangnga inphut Jisu ratha ngarnasik ajuotirsik eii.
Pathian in matiangnga Pathian chongkachoi ngai ileiminril angnga, angrakip inboolthar maklaiseng ama kha marwaan chungnga aom cheisik eii.

Ajarchu Moses in aleiti, ‘Pumi ning-Pathian khan nangni sik-ah kei inajuotir angnga Pathian chongkachoi ningmi tak inkhat ajuotirsik eii,’ ama'n nangni diangnga itho iril rakip kha juiru. Innidan 18:15,18
Tu e-innum Pathian chongkachoipa chongril kajuimak mikha, Pathian mi-ngai karra inphut thenkhoita aminmangsik eii. Innidan 18:19
Pathian chongkachoi rakip, Samuel makheiya inphut anuk ah kajuo ngaiseng in angme tuunlai pha katungnga kasuoksik rakip kha inleirilsuok jei.

Pathian chongkachoi ngai diangnga Pathian chong-inkhitna kha nangnisik kha eii, halli ningpi-ningpu ngai diangnga inphut chong-inkhitna khan nangni'n tum ningnei eii. Tichu Pathian in Abraham diang ati, ‘Ningtusuon-ningtesuon makheiya kei'n nuoipilchung miring rakip chungnga rawaan kapesik eii. Inphut 22:18
Khawa jarra nangni rakip in ningthamakna lamma inphut ningheikirra, ningrawaan thanasik, Pathian in nangni diang ma-insakhet ah Asuokpa kha ajuotirjei.”
